body:
Reporting the failure of `test_nosource_pkg_install` in the spack testsuite as per https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/14349#issuecomment-570367858

### Steps to reproduce the issue
```
$spack test
```

### Output
The output of the tests is [here](https://pastebin.com/i60n9e2Q)

### Information on your system

```
[sajid@xrmlite ~]$ spack arch
linux-centos8-broadwell
[sajid@xrmlite ~]$
```
title: test_nosource_pkg_install failure
